content: अभय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] Free from fear or danger, secure, safe; वैराग्यमेवाभयम् <ls>Bh. 3. 35.</ls> --यः [न भयं यस्मात्] {@--1@} An epithet of the Supreme Being, or knowledge concerning that being. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--3@} One devoid of all worldly possessions. {@--4@} One who fearlessly executes scriptural commandments. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Yoga (conjuncture or time) favourable to a march or expedition. --या {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (हरीतकी <ab>Mar.</ab> हिरडा). {@--2@} A form of the goddess Durgā. --यं {@--1@} Absence or removal of fear. {@--2@} Security, safety, protection from fear or danger; मया तस्याभयं दत्तं <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; अभयस्य हि यो दाता <ls>Ms. 8. 303</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 16.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sacrificial hymn. {@--4@} The root of a fragrant grass (वीरणमूलं, उशीरं).
